  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ActorController
    Controller class responsible for managing actor-related operations in the RAKCHA movie database application.
    CategoryController
    Controller class for managing film categories in the RAKCHA application.
    FilmController
    Controller class responsible for managing film-related operations in the RAKCHA application.
    FilmUserController
    Is responsible for handling user interactions related to viewing and commenting on films within a cinema website.
    PaymentController
    Controller class for handling payment processing in the RAKCHA application.
    PaymentUserController
    Controller class for handling user payments for cinema tickets.
    SeatSelectionController
    Controller class responsible for seat selection in the cinema booking process.
